articles.title: Enoch Godongwana is SA's new minister of finance as Mboweni resigns - News24
articles.description: Tito Mboweni has been replaced with Enoch Godongwana as South Africa's finance minister.
articles.content:
Enoch Godongwana is South Africa's new finance minister, after President Cyril Ramaphosa accepted Tito Mboweni's resignation.
